title: O/L Admission Cards available online
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Examinations said that facilities have been provided to download the admission cards for the GCE Ordinary Level Examination 2021 from the website of the Department of Examinations.
Commissioner-General of the Examinations L.M.D Dharmasena said that the examination will be held from the 23rd of May to the 1st of June and the relevant admission cards have already been mailed.
He added that if an applicant has not received the admission card yet, one can visit www.doenets.lk, click the G. C. E. O/L 2021 Icon, add the admission number and download the content.
If there are name changes, subject changes, and media amendments in the admission, it is also facilitated to make those amendments online by visiting the link www.onlineexams.gov.lk/cec
